kashmir-calling.title: Kashmir Calling – A Complete Valley Experience
kashmir-calling.location: Srinagar, Pahalgam, Gulmarg, Jammu & Kashmir, India
kashmir-calling.description: A magical exploration through Kashmir’s iconic destinations—Srinagar’s lakes and gardens, Pahalgam’s meadows, and Gulmarg’s alpine adventures.
kashmir-calling.longDescription:
Nestled in the northernmost part of India, Kashmir is often referred to as 'Heaven on Earth' due to its unmatched natural beauty, serene valleys, snow-clad mountains, and tranquil lakes. This enchanting region has a rich tapestry of history, blending ancient traditions with modern culture.

Kashmir's history dates back to ancient times when it was an important center of Hinduism and Buddhism. The region later saw the arrival of Islam in the 14th century, which shaped its cultural and architectural landscape. The Mughal emperors were captivated by Kashmir's beauty, leading to the construction of iconic Mughal gardens that still mesmerize visitors today.

The region is renowned for its handwoven Pashmina shawls, intricate handicrafts, and world-famous saffron. Its stunning landscapes have inspired poets, artists, and travelers for centuries, making it a must-visit destination for anyone seeking a blend of natural splendor and cultural richness.
includes: All transfers and sightseeing by Personalized AC Car
All Toll tax, parking fees & driver allowances
excludes: Gondola Tickets or any other tickets
Special clothing and Winter-wear on rent
Entrance fees to monuments and museum
Other meals not mentioned laundry, telephone calls, and incidentals.
Any personal expenses. Room service and special orders. Alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages.
Any expense arising due to unforeseen circumstances is not included.

activities: Arrival and transfer to Nigeen Lake houseboat

activities: Arrive and check-in at Pahalgam hotel

activities: Ride the Gulmarg Gondola to Apharwat Peak

itineraryDays.title: Gulmarg to Srinagar – Mughal Gardens and Dal Lake Exploration
activities: Visit Nishat Bagh, Shalimar Bagh, and Chashme Shahi
Walk along Dal Lake Boulevard or shop for Kashmiri crafts

itineraryDays.title: Departure from Srinagar
activities: Transfer to Srinagar Airport for departure

magical-kashmir.title: Magical Kashmir Escape
magical-kashmir.location: Srinagar, Pahalgam, Gulmarg, Sonmarg, Jammu & Kashmir, India
magical-kashmir.description: A complete escape into Kashmir’s most scenic gems—Gulmarg, Pahalgam, Sonmarg, and Srinagar—with unforgettable houseboat stays and local delicacies.

offbeat-sonmarg.title: Offbeat to Sonmarg - Kashmir
offbeat-sonmarg.description: Explore Gurez Valley’s untouched beauty, the serenity of Nigeen Lake, and iconic experiences in Gulmarg and Srinagar.
offbeat-sonmarg.longDescription: Kashmir is often referred to as 'Heaven on Earth' due to its stunning beauty—snow-capped mountains, alpine meadows, and timeless lakes. This tour covers some of Kashmir's most offbeat and pristine destinations, including Gurez Valley and Sonmarg, along with cultural icons like the Mughal Gardens and Dal Lake. You'll experience scenic mountain drives, houseboat stays, shikara rides, Gondola excursions, and a slice of traditional Kashmiri life. This is a unique chance to witness both the iconic and lesser-explored wonders of Kashmir in one seamless trip.
